feels.name: Acceptance
feels.quote: Miss Matty made a strong effort to conceal her feelingsâ€”a concealment she practised even with me, for she has never alluded to Mr Holbrook again, although the book he gave her lies with her Bible on the little table by her bedside.

feels.name: Sadness
feels.quote: Miss Matty heard the news in silence; in fact, from the account of the previous day, it was only what we had to expect.

feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: God forbid! said she in a low voice, that I should grieve any young hearts.

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: Miss Matty was very silent and thoughtful; after prayers she called Martha back and then she stood uncertain what to say.
